titleStmt.title: M1-8. 2 of 8. Anon. Holograph. In [Articles, essays, fiction and reviews], vol. 8 [1938-39], pp. 78-102. 13p.
titleStmt.author: Virginia Woolf

publicationStmt.authority: The Estate of Virginia Woolf, administered by the Society of Authors

msIdentifier.repository: Henry W. and Albert A. Berg Collection of English and American Literature

physDesc.p: M1-8. 2 of 8. Anon. Holograph. In [Articles, essays, fiction and reviews], vol. 8 [1938-39], pp. 78-102. 13p.

handNote.p: Holograph writing by the documents' main hand, Virginia Woolf

correction.p: Apparent errors have been explicitly corrected in sic / corr tags, wrapped in a choice element.

interpretation.p: Names and references to places and literary works have been wrapped in rs tags which link to annotations and secondary material.

projectDesc.p: Text encoded as part of 'The Digital "Anon": A Digital Genetic Edition of Virginia Woolf's Final Essays'. This project, funded by Leverhulme Grant ECF-2022-602, seeks to construct a TEI-XML based digital edition of the drafts of 'Anon' and 'The Reader', among the final documents Woolf wrote before her death.

del.l: Anon died> .. round about 1477. It was the
printed book that killed him yet at fair, the printed

p.l: Then the house is built; & the some one – a clergyman;
looks back. He looks back Time has drawn its blue veil
over the horizon. He has time to think about the
past in the quiet of the parsonage. He
Anon is singing
all Knigh
Then at When the house is built, Anon stops at the
back door. He sings Upstairs they talk French; English
has was gone down into the kitchen into the farmyard.
He sings in an uncouth fou . . He sings to young men &
maids. He tells them what they have heard already.
But save for this voice the English might be a dumb race.
& for the voice of Chaucer & Langland the English
might be a dumb race; to
Then The pr Then about
Anon is still the only [unparticular?] voice.
The house however became more &
more comfortable. At last we see someone in the house

winter is past. . . And the great
Ethn Elizabethan house is
in existence.
The Printing Press had come. It is the Printing
Press that preserves the dumb world.
